TopicTitle: [MISSION REPORT] Jank Co. Aerospace Division IKSA M-2/3 (Img Hvy)

Articles.Content:
Mission 2&3: Cyclops series satellite

Objective: Launch of a JCAD Cyclops series satellite into orbit of Mun and Minimus

Background: After the successful launch, deployment, and testing of the Cyclops Mk. III satellite over Kerbin. JCAD Proceeded with the design of a new launch vehicle to put a Cyclops series satellite over the Mun, and Minimus. Using a 4 stage launcher they successfully made orbit around the mun with plenty of fuel left. Engineer Toshogu made the determination that the same launch vehicle should also make it to minimus with no problems.

Vehicle Series: Cyclops

Remote Pilot: Francis Kerman
